name: Identifying Occult Symbols in Power Structures
description: Recognizing the esoteric symbols, sigils, and coded language used by elite families to signify their dominance and influence.

cards.title: Decoding Elite Symbolism
cards.description: Understanding the hidden meanings behind the symbols used by elite groups.
bulletpoints: Common symbols used in government, banking, and corporate logos.
How numerology and sacred geometry influence elite decision-making.
Tracing occult iconography in architecture and public monuments.
cards.summaryText: Spot recurring symbols, sacred geometry, and occult architecture flagging elite control.

cards.title: Esoteric Language and Hand Signs
cards.description: Breaking down the nonverbal communication methods used by elite factions.
bulletpoints: The role of Latin, Greek, and ancient languages in coded elite messages.
Identifying power signaling in public speeches and media broadcasts.
cards.summaryText: Decode the hand signs, ancient language cues, and power signals woven into public messaging.

cards.title: Hidden Rituals in Elite Institutions
cards.description: Analyzing the secretive ceremonies and rites performed by ruling bloodlines.
bulletpoints: Occult initiations within political, corporate, and entertainment circles.
Historical blood sacrifices and their modern equivalents.
How secret societies use ritual to bind members into loyalty.
cards.summaryText: Expose hidden initiations, sacrificial motifs, and loyalty rituals inside elite institutions.
